name: The Legend of Crushing Fist
description:
*At the Current Time Only a Linux version exists of The Legend Of Crushing Fist*

Robert, a man driven for revenge. His brother Paralyzed by a Master of the deadly arts, the Crushing Fist. Robert must make his way through  deadly  floors of kung fu action. To get to the man at the top he will have to put his training to the ultimate test . At the top Mister big bad, the breaker of backs, Dolf Angler is waiting.  Handle this onslaught of action or crash out in a hail of fists ?

  • Classic 70's Kung Fu action feel
  • Memorable characters such as Ricky B
  • Use combos and special moves to beat your opponents into submission
  • Cut-scenes with truly memorable animation.
  • Multiple opponent battles. Fight 11 dudes. (In Total)

Don't adjust your monitor, the fist cannot be reasoned with. 

Controls

WASD = movement

Q = Cycle Target

P = Punch

O + Any direction(Tapped) will dodge

Enter = Confirm

( A Combinations of WASD then P or L preforms special moves,  Down , Right , P (in sequence)
